title: The Ray Bradbury Theater Complete TV Series
description:
The Ray Bradbury Theater is an anthology series that ran for two seasons on HBO, three episodes per season from 1985 to 1986, and four additional seasons on USA Network from 1988 to 1992. It was later shown in reruns on the Sci Fi Channel. All 65 episodes were written by Ray Bradbury and many were based on short stories or novels he had written.

Files were encoded from 2014 DVD releases from Echo Bridge Home Entertainment using Handbrake and the recommended settings from The Webernets
